function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential risk of unauthorized access to private health records due to the use of digital technologies.","Impact":"Compromise of sensitive health information, leading to privacy violations and security breaches.","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict access controls, encryption, and secure authentication methods.","Technologies":"Access control systems, encryption algorithms, secure authentication protocols.","People":"Individuals with private health records, healthcare providers, data administrators.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, IT security professionals."},{"Description":"Risk of non-compliance with government regulations for transferring and sharing private health data over the internet.","Impact":"Legal consequences, fines, and reputational damage for non-compliance with data protection regulations.","Mitigation":"Adherence to strict government regulations, implementation of data privacy mechanisms, and secure data transfer protocols.","Technologies":"Data anonymization, blockchain technology, secure data transfer protocols.","People":"Healthcare organizations, data administrators, legal compliance teams.","Owner":"Legal compliance teams, healthcare organizations, data privacy officers."},{"Description":"Potential risk of data manipulation and tampering within the blockchain-based infrastructure.","Impact":"Loss of data integrity and trustworthiness, leading to inaccurate healthcare records and compromised patient care.","Mitigation":"Implementation of blockchain consensus mechanisms, regular data integrity checks, and secure encryption practices.","Technologies":"Blockchain consensus algorithms, data integrity checks, encryption methods.","People":"Individuals with private health records, healthcare providers, blockchain administrators.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, blockchain administrators, data integrity teams."}]}
